https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fee0n1fqasZUIO4cwiWSQz9BU8v.jpg When an escape pod detaches from a compromised colony spaceship, the sole four survivors, stranded in deep space, must determine what has happened and if someone among them is infected by a mysterious organism. Alien: Containment is one of six short films produced to celebrate the 40th anniversary of 1979's Alien. Alien: Containment
